entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
